Food diary.

S: -

D: salad with chop and rissole (I went to Mum's for dinner)

S: two salada light biscuits with lite cheese. 

Total H20 for the day: 1.5 litres

Total Exercise: 2km walk with Cory. - Brisk walk.

stomach: 49'

neck: 15'

As you can see, this entry is not locked.

I am taking a new approach. Using the methods I have learnt in the AJ Rochester book "A Lazy Girls Guide to Losing Weight and Getting Fit", I am dragging Cory along for the ride in the weight loss train. 

Tomorrow my journal entries will start again, along with my exercise. I will not use the word "DIET" because I will be working hard to be the best I can be. 

My Pledge *courtesy of AJ's book*: 

"I commit myself to being the very best that I can be. I deserve to love, be loved and most importantly of all, to love myself. I deserve a healthy bod and I will never gie up on myself, no matter what happens, and I promise to do whatever it takes to make it happen. Today is the first day of the rest of my life. SHAZAM!"
New community, made by me to help others and motivate others to join in working out! :)
